== About me ==
My name is Guillermo, I´m 18 years old and I live in Gijón, Spain. I´m a student.
My first linux distro was Knoppix, but in 2005 I discovered Ubuntu (5.10), so I used Ubuntu on my computer for 4 years, and now I switched to Kubuntu.
